content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on determining whether identified evidence is relevant for purposes of providing assistance under 38 U.S.C. 5103A, including
definition of relevant records
relevance determined on case-by-case basis
importance of Golz decision in determining relevance of evidence
other examples when records are considered not relevant
clinical mental health records considered relevant
, and
documenting the claims folder when identified evidence is not considered relevant
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Relevance Determinations
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
